name: Outside the Realm
description: Use the Wii U™ GamePad to control Amos the Astronaut as he travels through space collecting crystals for an alien merchant. Solve puzzles and dodge enemies to grab crystals and reach your ship safely. Travel outside the realm of your capability by solving puzzles in different regions of space. Enjoy bonus side-scrolling levels with lines of enemy aliens. Venture far, outside the realm.
